text: I like to keep a shovel in my trunk and
I have for all these years in case I
need to dig for Angie I really
anticipate this bring so much because in
the dead of winter you know in the
ground so frozen and if you can't even
get the shovel then I would just pull
over at the side of the road and look
for her I just can't give up and if it
means taking a shovel and and digging to
China I'm going to look for anything he
was 28 when she went missing on November
the 1st 2003 it was my son's daughter's
fifth birthday party and we were having
it here and Angie and her husband didn't
show up and I kept calling and wondering
where are you where are you then her
husband came two hours later and said
she was gone and said she'd ran away
with another man but we knew that she
had not ran away with another man the
next morning I was at the sheriff's
department and I filed a missing persons
report I was so scared I knew instantly
something was real wrong this is what
the billboards looked like looked really
strange to see such a billboard they're
so big you know you people notice those
they can't help but see the billboard it
didn't it didn't help me find Angie in
the end but anything that I have done is
it's productive yeah you have to just
keep trying and trying and never giving
up I'm just gonna post a flier of Angie
on this post
one of thousands basically it was just a
long time I just kept calling the police
department the Sheriff's Department
asking have you heard anything is there
anything and I really couldn't get any
help it was almost as if she was
dismissed from the get-go she never even
stood a chance but I've had to learn
over the years out and become more
forceful because that's what you have to
do well he said that they had gotten
into a fight and she fell off the deck
and hit her head on a rock and died but
he said that he set with her for a while
and he wrapped her up in a tarp and he
put her in the car
[Music]
he didn't put her on an island even the
police even said that's impossible
he served exactly four years and he's
been out for years now and and she's
still missing and he can never be
charged again I even went to visit him
in prison
and begged him literally begged him to
tell me where I can go collect her
remains he won't tell me I used to make
other Flyers that says I'm looking for
her exact remains and and that actually
says - you have to have the exact
remains to collect that reward I don't
care how many people say she's in a
better place let it go I don't care
that's not the same if they were in my
shoes they would want their their
child's remains she deserves a dignified
burial just like anybody does I have to
find Angie I have to find her as her
mother I I will never give up
